title: Summaries Lack Context
review: The summaries look polished, but they lack context from longer email chains and discussions.

title: Great Insights
review: I found that the insights were extremely helpful.

title: Generic Suggestions
review: I expected more sophisticated recommendations, but the solutions feel generic.

title: Constantly Double Checking Data
review: I save some time using this app, but I still need to double-check most of the data myself.

title: Worse After Update
review: After the latest update, the summaries got much worse. Important details from my emails and meetings are often missing from them.

title: Summaries Are Missing Critical Context
review: Email and meeting summaries keep skipping key replies and decisions in long threads. I’ve had multiple cases where action items were completely missing, so I can’t rely on it without reading everything again.

title: Summaries Got Worse After the Update
review: Since the last update, summaries are noticeably worse. They often ignore the latest messages and leave out deadlines. This used to be usable, but now it’s broken for my workflow.

title: Great Summaries for Quick Catch-Up
review: The summaries are consistently excellent for catching up fast. They pull out the right decisions and action items most of the time, and I rarely need to open the original email thread.

title: Insights Help Me Prioritize My Week
review: The insights have been surprisingly useful. They consistently surface the busiest days, overdue tasks, and threads I should respond to. I check it every morning.

title: Recommendations Feel Generic and Useless
review: The recommendations are overly generic (“follow up more”, “organize your inbox”). Nothing is tailored to what’s actually in my emails, so it’s not actionable.

title: Recommendations Actually Saved Me Time
review: A couple recommendations were spot on and helped me automate recurring follow-ups. I wish there were more like that, but the good ones were genuinely valuable.

title: Accuracy Issues: Wrong Names and Dates
review: The app regularly mixes up names and deadlines. Twice it attributed tasks to the wrong person, and it’s pulled the wrong date from a thread more than once. I have to verify almost everything.

title: Accuracy Is Solid for Me
review: I haven’t noticed many accuracy problems. When I compare the summaries to the original messages, they’re usually correct and the key details match.

title: Good App Overall, But Some Rough Edges
review: Overall it’s useful and saves time, but some features are inconsistent. Summaries vary depending on thread length, and recommendations can be hit-or-miss.

title: Summaries Are Great, Recommendations Are Meh
review: I love the summaries and use them daily, but the recommendations still feel too generic. If recommendations improved, this would be a 5-star app.

title: Insights Are Fine, Not Amazing
review: Insights are okay for a quick glance, but they don’t consistently highlight the most important items. I check them sometimes, but not every day.
